mean_cn: adj. 玩厌了的，厌烦于享乐的
mean_en: having or showing a lack of excitement or interest in something especially because it is very familiar
short_phrase: be blase about graduating from college
sentence: I was excited before I got my degree, but now I've got it, I'm pretty blase about it.
sentence_trans: 在拿到学位之前我还挺兴奋，但现在拿到之后就感到厌倦了。
